event.description: Jose Reyes grounds out, second baseman Darwin Barney to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Josh Thole grounds out, shortstop Starlin Castro to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Carlos Beltran walks.
Jason Bay singles on a line drive to left fielder Alfonso Soriano. Carlos Beltran to 2nd.
Daniel Murphy singles on a ground ball to right fielder Kosuke Fukudome, deflected by first baseman Carlos Pena. Carlos Beltran scores. Jason Bay to 3rd.
Justin Turner flies out to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Jason Pridie singles on a line drive to right fielder Kosuke Fukudome.
Ruben Tejada singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Reed Johnson. Jason Pridie to 2nd.
Dillon Gee ground bunts into a force out, pitcher Casey Coleman to third baseman Aramis Ramirez. Jason Pridie out at 3rd. Ruben Tejada to 2nd. Dillon Gee to 1st.
Jose Reyes singles on a ground ball to right fielder Kosuke Fukudome, deflected by second baseman Darwin Barney. Ruben Tejada to 3rd. Dillon Gee to 2nd.
Josh Thole singles on a line drive to right fielder Kosuke Fukudome. Ruben Tejada scores. Dillon Gee to 3rd. Jose Reyes to 2nd.
Carlos Beltran doubles (15) on a fly ball to center fielder Reed Johnson. Dillon Gee scores. Jose Reyes scores. Josh Thole to 3rd.
Pitcher Change: Justin Berg replaces Casey Coleman, batting 9th.
Jason Bay walks.
Daniel Murphy walks. Josh Thole scores. Carlos Beltran to 3rd. Jason Bay to 2nd.
Justin Turner walks. Carlos Beltran scores. Jason Bay to 3rd. Daniel Murphy to 2nd.
Pitcher Change: James Russell replaces Justin Berg, batting 9th.
Jason Pridie called out on strikes.
Ruben Tejada strikes out swinging.
Dillon Gee grounds out, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Jose Reyes grounds out, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Josh Thole flies out to center fielder Reed Johnson.
Carlos Beltran flies out to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Jason Bay grounds out, shortstop Starlin Castro to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Daniel Murphy flies out to right fielder Kosuke Fukudome.
Justin Turner singles on a line drive to right fielder Kosuke Fukudome.
Jason Pridie singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Kosuke Fukudome. Justin Turner to 2nd.
Ruben Tejada singles on a line drive to left fielder Alfonso Soriano. Justin Turner to 3rd. Jason Pridie to 2nd.
Dillon Gee out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Kosuke Fukudome. Justin Turner scores. Jason Pridie to 3rd.
Jose Reyes pops out to second baseman Darwin Barney.
Josh Thole grounds out to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Pitcher Change: Scott Maine replaces James Russell, batting 9th.
Carlos Beltran triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Kosuke Fukudome.
Jason Bay strikes out swinging.
Daniel Murphy flies out to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Justin Turner grounds out, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Jason Pridie called out on strikes.
Ruben Tejada strikes out swinging.
Dillon Gee walks.
Jose Reyes singles on a ground ball to left fielder Alfonso Soriano. Dillon Gee to 2nd.
Kosuke Fukudome walks.
Darwin Barney lines out to first baseman Daniel Murphy.
Starlin Castro singles on a ground ball to center fielder Jason Pridie. Kosuke Fukudome to 2nd.
Aramis Ramirez strikes out swinging.
Carlos Pena walks. Kosuke Fukudome to 3rd. Starlin Castro to 2nd.
Reed Johnson doubles (8) on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Jason Bay. Kosuke Fukudome scores. Starlin Castro scores. Carlos Pena to 3rd.
Alfonso Soriano doubles (7) on a fly ball to right fielder Carlos Beltran. Carlos Pena scores. Reed Johnson scores.
Welington Castillo grounds out, shortstop Jose Reyes to first baseman Daniel Murphy.
James Russell grounds out sharply, second baseman Ruben Tejada to first baseman Daniel Murphy.
Kosuke Fukudome flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Darwin Barney grounds out, third baseman Justin Turner to first baseman Daniel Murphy.
Starlin Castro grounds out, third baseman Justin Turner to first baseman Daniel Murphy.
Aramis Ramirez grounds out, third baseman Justin Turner to first baseman Daniel Murphy.
Carlos Pena singles on a line drive to left fielder Jason Bay.
Reed Johnson grounds into a force out, second baseman Ruben Tejada to shortstop Jose Reyes. Carlos Pena out at 2nd.
Alfonso Soriano pops out to second baseman Ruben Tejada.
Welington Castillo strikes out swinging.
James Russell flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Kosuke Fukudome grounds out, first baseman Daniel Murphy to pitcher Dillon Gee.
Darwin Barney flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Starlin Castro flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Aramis Ramirez pops out to first baseman Daniel Murphy.
Carlos Pena strikes out on foul tip.
Reed Johnson hit by pitch.
Alfonso Soriano strikes out swinging.
